shebang-command

Get the command from a shebang

Install

$ npm install --save shebang-command

Usage

```js const shebangCommand = require(‘shebang-command’);

shebangCommand(‘#!/usr/bin/env node’); //=> ‘node’

shebangCommand(‘#!/bin/bash’); //=> ‘bash’ ```

API

shebangCommand(string)

string

Type: string

String containing a shebang.
